thread.section_title: Yaniv & Associates, PC Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Yaniv & Associates, PC | uncontesteddivorceny.com
thread.title: Tamara Grillo
thread.title_full: Yaniv & Associates, PC reviewed by Tamara Grillo

author: Tamara Grillo
title: Tamara Grillo
text: I filed for an uncontested divorce through this company. Everyone I spoke to was so pleasant and helpful each time, from the secretary to the lawyer that was assigned to my case. I was so upset when I first called but he put my mind to ease and made this process so much less difficult. My ex husband even made me make revisions to the paperwork and I was stressed because I thought this would be an issue and occur more fees but it was no problem at all. They handled every aspect of this case in a timely manner. I would recommend this firm to anyone going through a divorce contested or uncontested. Thank you guys so much!!
